name: Strange Battlegrounds
description:
Virtual reality journey is available now!

Strange Battlegrounds Multiplayer is available now!

  • Battleroyale
  • Cooperative
  • TDM
  • Solo vs AI
  • Clan Wars

We are waiting for you!

This game made by the only man.

Controls:

w,a,s,d - moving

esc - settings

b - chat on/off

r - reload

mouse0 - shoot

mouse1 - scope (snipe only)

c - climb

f - pick up grenader
